CustomField.description: This lookup captures Task hierarchies: sub-Tasks have a Parent Task lookup value for the next higher-level Task in the Task hierarchy. Note that this is separate and distinct from temporal (dependent/predecessor) relationships between Tasks.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This lookup captures Task hierarchies: sub-Tasks have a Parent Task lookup value for the next higher-level Task in the Task hierarchy. Note that this is separate and distinct from temporal (dependent/predecessor) relationships between Tasks.
CustomField.label: Parent Task
